remarks: Compose a path homotopy with a continuous map.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
statement:
phtpyco2.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
phtpyco2.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( II Cn J ) ) $.
phtpyco2.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
phtpyco2.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( F ( PHtpy ` J ) G ) ) $.
phtpyco2 $p |- ( ph -> ( P o. H ) e. ( ( P o. F ) ( PHtpy ` K ) ( P o. G ) ) ) $.
